{"rule":"MORFOLOGIK_RULE_EN_US","sentence":"^\\QHowever, the subharmonic modes are usually unstable, melting the time crystal to the trivial infinite temperature state as predicted by the Floquet Eigenstate Thermalization Hypothesis \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-)[0-9]+\\Q.\\E$"}
